verses.verse: And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that God <WH430> did prove <WH5254> Abraham <WH85>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH85>, Abraham; and he said <WH559>, Here am I.

And he said <WH559>, Take now <WH3947> thy son <WH1121>, thine only <WH3173> son <WH157>, whom thou lovest, even Isaac <WH3327>, and get thee <WH3212> into the land <WH776> of Moriah <WH4179>; and offer him <WH5927> there for a burnt-offering <WH5930> upon one <WH259> of the mountains <WH2022> which I will tell thee of <WH559>.

And Abraham <WH85> rose early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>, and saddled <WH2280> his ass <WH2543>, and took <WH3947> two <WH8147> of his young men <WH5288> with him <WH3327>, and Isaac his son <WH1121>; and he clave <WH1234> the wood <WH6086> for the burnt-offering <WH5930>, and rose up <WH6965>, and went <WH3212> unto the place <WH4725> of which God <WH430> had told him <WH559>.
On the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> Abraham <WH85> lifted up <WH5375> his eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> the place <WH4725> afar off <WH7350>.

And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> unto his young men <WH5288>, Abide <WH3427> ye here with the ass <WH2543>, and I and the lad <WH5288> will go <WH3212> yonder <WH3541>; and we will worship <WH7812>, and come again to you <WH7725>.

And Abraham <WH85> took <WH3947> the wood <WH6086> of the burnt-offering <WH5930>, and laid <WH7760> it upon Isaac <WH3327> his son <WH1121>; and he took <WH3947> in his hand <WH3027> the fire <WH784> and the knife <WH3979>; and they went <WH3212> both <WH8147> of them together <WH3162>.

And Isaac <WH3327> spake <WH559> unto Abraham <WH85> his father <WH1>, and said <WH559>, My father <WH1>: and he said <WH559>, Here am I <WH1121>, my son. And he said <WH559>, Behold <WH784>, the fire and the wood <WH6086>: but where is the lamb <WH7716> for a burnt-offering <WH5930>?

And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559>, God <WH430> will <WH1121> provide <WH7200> himself the lamb <WH7716> for a burnt-offering <WH5930>, my son <WH3212>: so they went both of them <WH8147> together <WH3162>.

And they came <WH935> to the place <WH4725> which God <WH430> had told <WH559> him of <WH85>; and Abraham built <WH1129> the altar <WH4196> there <WH6186>, and laid the wood <WH6086> in order <WH6186>, and bound <WH6123> Isaac <WH3327> his son <WH1121>, and laid <WH7760> him on the altar <WH4196>, upon <WH4605> the wood <WH6086>.
And Abraham <WH85> stretched forth <WH7971> his hand <WH3027>, and took <WH3947> the knife <WH3979> to slay <WH7819> his son <WH1121>.
And the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> called <WH7121> unto him out of heaven <WH8064>, and said <WH559>, Abraham <WH85>, Abraham <WH85>: and he said <WH559>, Here I am.

And he said <WH559>, Lay <WH7971> not thy hand <WH3027> upon <WH413> the lad <WH5288>, neither do thou <WH6213> anything <WH3972> unto him <WH6258>; for now I know <WH3045> that thou fearest God <WH430>, seeing thou hast not <WH3808> withheld <WH2820> thy son <WH1121>, thine only <WH3173> son <WH1121>, from me.

And Abraham <WH85> lifted up <WH5375> his eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200>, and <WH310>, behold, behind him a ram <WH352> caught <WH270> in the thicket <WH5442> by his horns <WH7161>: and Abraham <WH85> went <WH3212> and took <WH3947> the ram <WH352>, and offered him up <WH5927> for a burnt-offering <WH5930> in the stead <WH8478> of his son <WH1121>.

And Abraham <WH85> called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of that place <WH4725> Jehovah-jireh <WH3070>: as <WH834> it is said <WH559> to this day <WH3117>, In the mount <WH2022> of Jehovah <WH3068> it shall be provided <WH7200>.
And the angel <WH4397> of Jehovah <WH3068> called <WH7121> unto Abraham <WH85> a second time <WH8145> out of heaven <WH8064>,

and said <WH559>, By myself have I sworn <WH7650>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, because <WH3282> thou hast done <WH6213> this thing <WH1697>, and hast not <WH3808> withheld <WH2820> thy son <WH1121>, thine only son <WH3173>,

that in blessing <WH1288> I will bless <WH1288> thee <WH7235>, and in multiplying I will multiply <WH7235> thy seed <WH2233> as the stars <WH3556> of the heavens <WH8064>, and as the sand <WH2344> which is upon the <WH3220> seashore <WH8193>; and thy seed <WH2233> shall possess <WH3423> the gate <WH8179> of his enemies <WH341>;
and in thy seed <WH2233> shall all the nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776> be blessed <WH1288>; because <WH834> thou hast obeyed <WH8085> my voice <WH6963>.

So Abraham <WH85> returned <WH7725> unto his young men <WH5288>, and they rose up <WH6965> and went <WH3212> together <WH3162> to Beer-sheba <WH884>; and Abraham <WH85> dwelt <WH3427> at Beer-sheba <WH884>.

And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that it was told <WH5046> Abraham <WH85>, saying <WH559>, Behold <WH4435>, Milcah, she also hath borne <WH3205> children <WH1121> unto thy brother <WH251> Nahor <WH5152>:
Uz <WH5780> his first-born <WH1060>, and Buz <WH938> his brother <WH251>, and Kemuel <WH7055> the father <WH1> of Aram <WH758>,
and Chesed <WH3777>, and Hazo <WH2375>, and Pildash <WH6394>, and Jidlaph <WH3044>, and Bethuel <WH1328>.
And Bethuel <WH1328> begat <WH3205> Rebekah <WH7259>: these eight <WH8083> did Milcah <WH4435> bear <WH3205> to Nahor <WH5152>, Abraham <WH85>'s brother <WH251>.
And his concubine <WH6370>, whose name <WH8034> was Reumah <WH7208>, she also bare <WH3205> Tebah <WH2875>, and Gaham <WH1514>, and Tahash <WH8477>, and Maacah <WH4601>.
